patthana15.14:1.1: Hetuṁ hīnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nahīno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.14:2.1: Nahetuṁ majjhimaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nanahetu namajjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.14:3.1: Hetuṁ paṇītaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu napaṇīto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
